attributes.title: This app wants me dead
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to keep America great, and everyone told me if I downloaded it America would be great! but when I downloaded it my life went down hill. I think it might be cursed. Disturbing images of a orange man glitched onto the screen. And on top of that after I downloaded the app I fell down the stairs! DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD!!! This orange monster will haunt you!!
attributes.userName: the one that must not be named

attributes.title: Horrible, glitchy, racist, disgusting, nasty app 🙂
attributes.review: This app took others weeks to download, but mine took MONTHS. I COULDNT USE MY OHONE FOR MONTHS. Thanks Donald. When I opened it, a song started playing that hurt my ears but also brought many bugs to me. It never stopped playing, even when I turned my phone off. I eventually burned my phone as there was no alternative.

attributes.title: Wowwwww
attributes.review: I’ve never had such a terrible experience in my life, when I opened the app all the sudden I five nights at Freddys jump scare came in my face and made me fall off my chair then my mom came in my room yelling at me about “what was that loud noise” then beat my a**. When I got back in the app there was text on the screen that said “Haha, got you” I hate this app😡

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app expecting to educate myself, but instead it taught me stuff I already knew. This app took app so long to download I should’ve gone to mars and back and it still wouldn’t be done downloading. This app disappointed me I had more fun dying in flappy bird.  When this app taught me stuff I already knew it made me want to slam my phone. I am appalled.

attributes.title: 💘🥐🍊no ❤️😻😍🍤
attributes.review: no❤️ this app takes up too much space in the AppStore 👅😹 and we don’t need apps that are made by an orange racist homophobic ped 🍊 😼🥐🤮 this app also made my dog get the cats and the cats get the cockroaches and they had a spiritual meeting in my attic 🤑🌽👅😹🍏💅🏻👹💕🤮 yea no ❤️ just don’t get this app its a waste of storage 😻🥰🌝👅👺💕👺🌽  yuh 😍😍 me 2020 😻 and TRUMP not MY president 🤮❤️❤️😻 you prolly smell like Cheetos and they made some emojis for you 🍤🥐🤮🍊 yea ❤️

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app isn’t even worthy of one star. You download it and it just continues and continues and continues to load and after a long time of waiting for it to load, it says there is an error and to try again sooner like what? Isn’t this the president he should do better than this. He should be ashamed.

attributes.title: gross❤️
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app my phone was swarmed with multiple viruses that always made my brightness at the fullest and locked my screen sideways. It also takes up wayyyy too much storage, just downloading it alone made me delete hundreds of pictures and a couple apps too! The icon is also ugly❤️ get rid of it😚

attributes.title: Scared
attributes.review: The app made my phone start to uncontrollably vibrate causing my 80 year old grandpa go into a PTSD induced fit as he ran out of the house screaming. It took us 3 days to find him and when we did he couldn’t stop saying Trump 2020 and repeatedly saying racist and homophobic slurs. We don’t know how to fix him. Terrible app, 0/100, would never use again.

attributes.title: Waste of my time
attributes.review: This app is very 1 star quality it has this picture of a moldy orange when you open it. It made my phone throw up so I had to delete it right away. I think you guys should take this app off of the App Store right away because a bunch of ignorant information is held in this app. Oh and also BLACK LIVES MATTER, DEFUND THE POLICE, HISPANIC LIVES MATTER, FREE THE KIDS, #GENZ2020 #TRUMP2020-But on a grave✨🧚🏼‍♀️💕

attributes.title: Rip Carter
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app they played awful sounds of baby’s screaming in pain and men projectile vomiting after that it played a trump speech and my cousin actually died to the sound when I tried you clear the app out it wouldn’t let me do anything I had to get a new phone and bury my old one because it wouldn’t even die!
